com.communote.server.web.commons.controller

Class StaticPageSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.web.commons.controller.StaticPageSection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Orderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnhancedPageSection

    public class StaticPageSection
extends Object
implements Orderable
    Holds the details of a section of a static page.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • StaticPageSection

        public StaticPageSection(String id)
        Create a new section.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the section which can only contain word characters (see Pattern) and the dash character

      • getContentTemplateName

        public String getContentTemplateName()
        The name of the template for rendering the content.
        Returns:
        the name of the template or null if not template is set

      • getContentTemplateParameter

        public Map<String,Object> getContentTemplateParameter()
        Returns:
        parameters that are required for rendering the content template

        public String getId()
        Returns:
        the ID of the page

      • getOrder

        public int getOrder()
        Specified by:
        getOrder in interface Orderable
        Returns:
        the order value for sorting the sections. Returns by default 100

      • getShortTitle

        public String getShortTitle(Locale locale,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Return the localized short title
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to use for internationalization
        request - the current request
        Returns:
        the localized short title or the value of #getTitle(Locale) if no short title is set

      • getTitle

        public String getTitle(Locale locale,
                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Return the localized title
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to use for internationalization
        request - the current request
        Returns:
        the localized title or an empty string if not title is set

      • isContentTemplate

        public boolean isContentTemplate()
        Returns:
        whether a content template was set.

      • isShortTitleAvailable

        public boolean isShortTitleAvailable()
        Returns:
        whether a short title was set

      • setContent

        public void setContent(LocalizedMessage content,
                       boolean needsRequest)
        Set the content. The content set with this method takes precedence over the one set with setContentMessageKey(String) but if also a content template is set, the template will be used.
        Parameters:
        content - the localizable content
        needsRequest - whether the localized message needs the request object to create the message. If true the request will be passed as argument to the toString method of the localized message

      • setContentMessageKey

        public void setContentMessageKey(String contentMessageKey)
        Set the message key which should be used to resolve the localized content
        Parameters:
        contentMessageKey - the message key of the content

      • setContentTemplateName

        public void setContentTemplateName(String contentTemplateName)
        Set the name/id of a template that should be rendered as the content of the section
        Parameters:
        contentTemplateName - the name of the template to render

      • setOrder

        public void setOrder(int order)
        Set a custom order. The higher the value the earlier the section will be rendered.
        Parameters:
        order - the order to set

      • setShortTitle

        public void setShortTitle(LocalizedMessage shortTitle,
                          boolean needsRequest)
        Set a shorter version of the title which could for instance be shown in a menu. The title set with this method takes precedence over the one set with setShortTitleMessageKey(String).
        Parameters:
        shortTitle - the short title
        needsRequest - whether the localized message needs the request object to create the message. If true the request will be passed as argument to the toString method of the localized message

      • setShortTitleMessageKey

        public void setShortTitleMessageKey(String shortTitleMessageKey)
        Set the message key for resolving a localized shorter version of the title which could for instance be shown in a menu.
        Parameters:
        shortTitleMessageKey - the message key of the short title

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(LocalizedMessage title,
                     boolean needsRequest)
        Set the title of the section. The title set with this method takes precedence over the one set with setTitleMessageKey(String).
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the section
        needsRequest - whether the localized message needs the request object to create the message. If true the request will be passed as argument to the toString method of the localized message

      • setTitleMessageKey

        public void setTitleMessageKey(String titleMessageKey)
        Set the message key for resolving a localized title of the section.
        Parameters:
        titleMessageKey - the message key of the title
